meanings.sent1: She unwittinly walked into the wrong classroom.
meanings.sent2: He unwittinly left his keys at home.
meanings.sent3: The cat unwittinly knocked over the vase while chasing a bug.
meanings.sent4: The clouds drifted unwittinly across the sky, unaware of the impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The child unwittinly wandered off in the crowded mall, lost in the sea of people.

meanings.definition: Without intending to or without knowledge
meanings.sent1: They unwittinly offended their friend by forgetting their birthday.
meanings.sent2: She unwittinly revealed the surprise party plan to the birthday girl.
meanings.sent3: The chef unwittinly added salt instead of sugar to the cake batter.
meanings.sent4: The detective unwittinly stumbled upon a crucial piece of evidence in an old case file.
meanings.sent5: The hiker unwittinly trespassed into a restricted area, unaware of the danger lurking within.
